alert.note: Alert for Faribault; Freeborn (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 5:59PM CDT until May 19 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Freeborn County in south central Minnesota... East central Faribault County in south central Minnesota... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alden, or 12 miles west of Albert Lea, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Albert Lea around 610 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
